|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188SU; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "LPC0038 REV:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
[http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/linux-networking-3/wn-370usb-wireless-adapter-914283/ ID mention], ID is not currently in r8712u
